@mixin mockup($type) { @if ($type == "tablet angle single") { img { max-width: 800px; } } @if ($type == "tablet portrait single") { img { // tablet max-width: 500px; // mobile @include mobile { max-width: 320px; } // laptop @include laptop-and-up { max-width: 350px; } // desktop @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 500px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet portrait double") { img { max-width: 320px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 400px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet side single") { img { max-width: 180px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 300px; } } } @if ($type == "mobile portrait double") { img { max-width: 260px; @include below-laptop { max-width: 300px; } } } @if ($type == "mobile side double") { img { max-width: 200px; @include below-laptop { max-width: 300px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 240px; } } } @if ($type == "desktop right double") { img { max-width: 400px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 600px; } } } @if ($type == "desktop front") { img { max-width: 600px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } } } @if ($type == "laptop double") { img { max-width: 400px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 600px; } } } @if ($type == "laptop single") { img { max-width: 600px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } } } }
